| Improve this Doc View Source

Model

Which Moderation model to use for this request. Two content moderations models are available: TextModerationStable and TextModerationLatest. The default is TextModerationLatest which will be automatically upgraded over time.This ensures you are always using our most accurate model.If you use TextModerationStable, we will provide advanced notice before updating the model. Accuracy of TextModerationStable may be slightly lower than for TextModerationLatest.

Declaration
[JsonProperty("model")]
public string Model { get; set; }
